input.value: Event data is not associated with change ticket [

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:variable name="tsoErrorReason">${status reason}</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="tsoErrorMessage">${error message}</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="tsErrorMessage">${ts error message}</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="itsmErrorMessage">${itsm error message}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space($tsoErrorReason)) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('TSO login error reason: ', $tsoErrorReason, '. ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space($tsoErrorMessage)) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('TSO login error message: ', $tsoErrorMessage, '. ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space($tsErrorMessage)) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('Event source login error message: ', $tsErrorMessage, '. ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space($itsmErrorMessage)) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('ITSM login error message: ', $itsmErrorMessage, '. ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <inputParameters> <inputParameter> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">event data</xsl:text> </name> <value>${event data}</value> </inputParameter> <inputParameter> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">change data</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </value> </inputParameter> <inputParameter> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">itsm type</xsl:text> </name> <value>${itsm type}</value> </inputParameter> <inputParameter> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">all configurations</xsl:text> </name> <value>${all configurations}</value> </inputParameter> <inputParameter> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">event source type</xsl:text> </name> <value>${event source type}</value> </inputParameter> <inputParameter> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">itsm authentication token</xsl:text> </name> <value>${itsm authentication token}</value> </inputParameter> </inputParameters> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="concat('Remediation job ID: ', //jobId/text(), ' started asynchronously')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="concat('Remediation job ID: ', //jobId/text(), ' started asynchronously')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
